nodes.text: So the trap door in the gazebo leads down into the underground corridor. Interesting.
I am so glad Giant Proach is dead. I could not kill it on my own.
Why was killing the Giant Proach so important to you?
I vanted to do something to deserve to be at school for Heroes. I vanted to prove that I could be hero too, if only to Gregor.
So, are you a Werewolf or something?
Verevolf? Of course not!
I am Rover. Ve shapeshift. My pack can take shape of volves.
What's the difference between being a Shapeshifter and a Werewolf?
Verevolves are cursed. They have the mind of a crazed animal that vants only to kill. Vith Rovers, ve are ourselves vhat ever shape ve take.
Can you take other forms besides a wolf?
(shrug) No. Only very vise and skilled Rovers can take many shapes. For now, I am only a volf.

options.text: Compliment Esme About Being a Wolf

nodes.text: You can change into a wolf - that's amazing! You really are something special.
Is not special for Rover.
Well, then, all Rovers are amazing.
I would have died if you hadn't attacked the Giant Proach. I owe you for that. You saved my life.
I did not vant you to die, Shawn.
You are noble and very brave, Esme. You belong here at the school because you really are a hero.
What did one wolf say to the other wolf?
I do not know...
Howl's it going? Get it?
No.
Oh well...
Here we are, alone together in the moonlight of the courtyard, just the two of us...
How can ve be alone if ve are together?
Um... I just meant that it's romantic being with you here. You look so beautiful...
So you are trying to court me here?
Um... er... yes... sort of...
You are sveet, Shawn. You vill not make a good husband for me right now, so I vill not court vith you. Maybe though I vill let you kiss me a little every now and then.
(kiss)
And maybe too, someday ve vill court each other, okay?
Okay!
We should probably return to the Rec Room before people start talking about us...
They are already talking about us, so let us go back together and let them talk some more!
